sentences.en: Failure to ration carefully becomes correspondingly less important.
sentences.cn: 不去细致地安排日粮,也不太要紧.

sentences.en: Fuel was rationed during the war.
sentences.cn: 战争期间，燃油定量供应。

sentences.en: Have you used your ration of petrol for this week?
sentences.cn: 你用了这星期给你定量的汽油了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Procreation will be an annual formality like the renewal of a ration card.
sentences.cn: 生殖的事要弄得像发配给证一样成为一年一度的手续形式.

sentences.en: The authorities have begun to issue ration cards.
sentences.cn: 当局已经开始发放定量配给卡。

sentences.en: The meat ration was down to one pound per person per week.
sentences.cn: 肉的配给量降到了每人每周一磅。

sentences.en: The new ration did not start till tomorrow and he had only four cigarettes left.
sentences.cn: 下一份供应量要到明天才能买,他的烟卷儿可只剩四支啦.

sentences.en: The ration is the amount of feed offered to the pig daily.
sentences.cn: 日粮是每日为猪提供的饲料喂给量.

sentences.en: The standard ration pack had to be portioned out among fourteen men.
sentences.cn: 一箱标准的配给食物必须分给14个人.

sentences.en: There are two major problems in trying to ration minerals to pigs.
sentences.cn: 给猪补充矿物质有两个主要问题.

sentences.en: They had to ration petrol during the war.
sentences.cn: 战时他们不得不限量供给汽油。

sentences.en: They have begun to issue ration cards for basic necessities such as rice and flour.
sentences.cn: 他们开始发行用来购买大米、面粉等生活基本必需品的定量配给卡。

sentences.en: We all had to queue up for our ration books.
sentences.cn: 我们都得排队领取定量配给票证薄。

sentences.en: We have to ration the water.
We'll have to ration out the water.
sentences.cn: 我们得将水按定额配给.

words.tran_cn: 实行合理化；作辩解；合理地思考
使……合理化；使……有理化；为……找借口

phrases.phrase: come up (或 be given) with the rations
phrases.tran_cn: (军俚)（勋章）按人颁发（并非根据论功行赏原则授予）

trans.tran_cn: 定量，配给量，口粮，合理的量，正常量
trans.tran_en: a fixed amount of something that people are allowed to have when there is not enough, for example during a war
to control the supply of something because there is not enough

trans.tran_cn: 限量供应，配给供应，给与…一天口粮，供给（兵士）伙食，限定（粮食等）
trans.tran_en: to control the supply of something because there is not enough
